sentences.en: A great number of polar owls, white geese, brant geese, Arctic foxes, walruses and other animals live here.
sentences.cn: 大量的白猫头鹰，白鹅，黑雁，北极狐，海象以及其它动物在这里生存。

sentences.en: European goose smaller than the brant; breeds in the far north.
sentences.cn: 比普通黑雁小的欧洲鹅; 在很远的北方繁殖.

sentences.en: It is mere surmise that Bosch had Brant's poem in mind when doing this painting.
sentences.cn: 认为博斯在画这幅画时脑子里想着布兰特的诗，这仅仅是猜测而已。

sentences.en: My sister said not to take Professor Brant for English.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐说不要修布兰特教授的英文课.

sentences.en: Robin Brant reports from Kuala Lumpur.
sentences.cn: 罗宾布莱特报道自吉隆坡.

trans.tran_en: a small goose, Branta bernicla, that has a dark grey plumage and short neck and occurs in most northern coastal regions
